## BCW Step 7 – Identifying possible changes {.appendix}

#TODO this table is incomplete and needs replacing with the initial table from the focus groups.

The original instructions @michieBehaviourChangeWheel2014 were to:

*Use the APEASE criteria to identify appropriate \[Behaviour Change Techniques\] based on the intervention functions identified in Step 5*.

Because EQUATOR members were not familiar with behaviour change techniques I performed this step on my own and instead I asked EQUATOR members to brainstorm intervention changes to address "what needs to change" items from step 4 by considering each intervention function in turn.
